channel.title: My server progress(ULTIMATE PKING) - Servious Scape
channel.description:
hehe well im currently making a server designed purely for pking then adding skills ect after... So here is a list of all the features i have added so far.
[center]- Kbow Uses Kbolts - Ice Blitz Delaying(80%) - Ice Barrage 100% - Blood Barrage 100% - 100% Vengeance - Magic Bonus' - Range Bonus' - 100% BONUS' (Stab/Slash/Crush/Range) (A lvl 126 with nothing on would never hit a lvl 126 in full gear....) - 99% Ancient Teleports With Delays(Adding invulneribility while teleporting now) - Saradomin Brews - Prayer Potions - Str/Att/Def Potions - 100% Protection Prayers - 100% Smite - 100% Retribution - 100% Redemption - 100% Prayer Buttons - 100% Magic Spell Queing - 100% Food Queing - 100% Food - Added lots more requirements - Portal Handled To Add Economy(No Emote Tabs) - Funny Training Area - Vengeance-Other Nonwild Right Click Option - When running up to someone after clicking "Attack" it will attack strait away(You dont have to click "Attack" once your next to them again) - 90% Farcasting - Proper Spell Runes - 100% Pking Timers - 100% Syncronized Pking Timers - 100% Autocasting (15 Line Method...????? :p) - 100% Protect Item - 90% Throwing Weapons - 100% Veracs Set Effects - 100% PRAYER BONUS(No other server ive seen has this) - Working Auto-Retaliate - 2 Desert Bandit Camps - Walk through the desert to change to ancients - Working Glory Edgeville Teleports - Adding Runecrafting Abyss/Runerunner PKing - And heaps more i just cant think of!
If you have any ideas or wanna comment please do so :p

item.title: My server progress(ULTIMATE PKING) - Servious Scape
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Maul Ancient Maul
item.description:
@Ancient_Maul wrote:

hehe well im currently making a server designed purely for pking then adding skills ect after… So here is a list of all the features i have added so far.

[center]- Kbow Uses Kbolts

  • Ice Blitz Delaying(80%)
  • Ice Barrage 100%
  • Blood Barrage 100%
  • 100% Vengeance
  • Magic Bonus’
  • Range Bonus’
  • 100% BONUS’ (Stab/Slash/Crush/Range) (A lvl 126 with nothing on would never hit a lvl 126 in full gear…)
  • 99% Ancient Teleports With Delays(Adding invulneribility while teleporting now)
  • Saradomin Brews
  • Prayer Potions
  • Str/Att/Def Potions
  • 100% Protection Prayers
  • 100% Smite
  • 100% Retribution
  • 100% Redemption
  • 100% Prayer Buttons
  • 100% Magic Spell Queing
  • 100% Food Queing
  • 100% Food
  • Added lots more requirements
  • Portal Handled To Add Economy(No Emote Tabs)
  • Funny Training Area
  • Vengeance-Other Nonwild Right Click Option
  • When running up to someone after clicking “Attack” it will attack strait away(You dont have to click “Attack” once your next to them again)
  • 90% Farcasting
  • Proper Spell Runes
  • 100% Pking Timers
  • 100% Syncronized Pking Timers
  • 100% Autocasting (15 Line Method…??? :p)
  • 100% Protect Item
  • 90% Throwing Weapons
  • 100% Veracs Set Effects
  • 100% PRAYER BONUS(No other server ive seen has this)
  • Working Auto-Retaliate
  • 2 Desert Bandit Camps
  • Walk through the desert to change to ancients
  • Working Glory Edgeville Teleports
  • Adding Runecrafting Abyss/Runerunner PKing
  • And heaps more i just cant think of!

If you have any ideas or wanna comment please do so
